question_text: Which of the following statements accurately describe how DKIM and DMARC interact? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: DKIM uses public key cryptography to validate email content
DMARC can specify what to do if DKIM validation fails
DKIM must be used if SPF is enabled
DMARC relies on either SPF or DKIM to function
correct_answer: DKIM uses public key cryptography to validate email content
DMARC can specify what to do if DKIM validation fails
DMARC relies on either SPF or DKIM to function
explanation: DKIM signs the message; DMARC uses DKIM or SPF to determine authentication success and enforce policy.
